channel.title: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!" - I need to get Survived the Impossible item, please help

item.title: Re: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded: Okay, please make room for me in Jokers. But on the other hand, i'll send my other alt of your village Swan ^ ^ thanks guys. moodragon, i'll be there in awhile, just gotta get somethings done first. Thank you again

item.title: Re: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded: actually if you're interested joker's set to blow in a few weeks (~3) so that may be a better bet for you.

item.title: Re: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded: Okay, well i'll wait alittle and then i'll head over there. Uzuki, i didnt mean it as village realted, its just for the wasteland effect, and i'm only concered, but FINALLY my village leader got serous, so i think they'll be okay for a while. SWAN, I'LL HEAD OVER THERE IN SOME WEEKS OR SO. MESSAGE ME, MY CHARCTER IS JACK.

item.title: Re: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded: Well if you can wait 1-3 months I should be completing the IM in that time, so you are free to join SRCC village when it happens.

item.title: Re: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded:
Survived the Impossible doesn't do a whole lot to help your village. It's -5% upkeep (good), no stamina loss in wasteland (doesn't really affect the village, as most wasteland stuff isn't village related), and some stamina (again, minimal effect on the village).

To be honest, the time spent leaving your village probably costs more than the benefit that you actually provide your village by having it.

item.title: Re: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded: Okay, but the only reason i'm too hasty about it is that i'm Co Vice Kage.. or Superintendent, and i'd have to help my village alot, since i'm the most active player on there.

item.title: Re: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded:
No you don't. Survived the Impossible is totally optional, just like the arena and just about everything else in BvS.

If you want to earn it, join (or found) a village on a permanent basis and built it up to epic status. Then when it goes nuclear, you will be second in line right behind the kage.

In other words, earn it.

item.title: I need to Survive the Impossible!!!!!
item.content:encoded: I NEED TO GET " Survived the Impossible" item!!!!! I've tried to go on other villages, but they i never get a chance to enter. My character name is Jack and please get me a village that WILL BLOW UP ANYTIME SOON!!!!
